title: Discover the Greek Island of Lemnos with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinners & Return Airport Transfers
description: Venture off the beaten track and discover the secluded beauty of the Greek island of Lemnos. Known for its wild mountains, large stretches of sandy beaches, crystalline waters, idyllic coastline, and legends of Greek mythology, Lemnos is an undiscovered paradise away from the traditional tourist spots. Includes daily breakfast, nightly three-course dinners and more.
